summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and prescribing fees for use, grading, sign, gas piping, building, elevator, mechanical system, boiler and pressure vessel, and electrical permits, and for the furnishing of certain services and materials; defining offenses and providing penalties, and repealing Ordinances 103796 and 103832, Section 6 of Ordinance 84905, Section 9 of Ordinance 83843, and all other ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
